blocks.name: pmtridf1o
blocks.content: Transpositions of ` X ` and ` Y ` (understood to be the identity when ` X = Y ` ), are bijections. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtridf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cif(cres(cid, c1), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c3, c4, w0, wf1o(c0, c1, c1))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wceq(c3, c4)), wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wceq(c0, cres(cid, c1)), wf1o(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  syl5eq(c0, cres(cid, c1), cif(cres(cid, c1), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)), wa(w0, wceq(c3, c4)))
  adantl(w0, wceq(c3, c4), wceq(cif(cres(cid, c1), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)), cres(cid, c1)))
  iftrue(cres(cid, c1), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wceq(c3, c4))
  a1i(wa(w0, wceq(c3, c4)), wf1o(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  biimpar(wceq(c0, cres(cid, c1)), wf1o(cres(cid, c1), c1, c1), wf1o(c0, c1, c1))
  f1oeq1(c0, cres(cid, c1), c1, c1)
  syl(wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)), wf1o(c0, c1, c1), wcel(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1))))
  eqeltrd(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1)), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)))
  syl5eq(c0, cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), cif(cres(cid, c1), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)), wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)))
  syl(wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)), wceq(cif(cres(cid, c1), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wceq(c3, c4)), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4))), wn(wceq(c3, c4)))
  neneqd(c3, c4, wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)))
  iffalse(cres(cid, c1), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), wceq(c3, c4))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c1), cpr(c3, c4)), crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1))), wcel(c1, c2), wss(cpr(c3, c4), c1), wbr(cpr(c3, c4), cen, c2o))
  adantr(w0, wne(c3, c4), wcel(c1, c2))
  prssd(c3, c4, c1, wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wne(c3, c4)), wbr(cpr(c3, c4), cen, c2o), wcel(c3, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wne(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wne(c3, c4), wcel(c3, c1))
  adantr(w0, wne(c3, c4), wcel(c4, c1))
  simpr(w0, wne(c3, c4))
  pr2nelem(c3, c1, c4, c1)
  pmtrrn(c1, c2, cpr(c3, c4), cfv(cpmtr, c1), crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1)))
  pmtrff1o(c0, crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1)), c1, cfv(cpmtr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cpmtr, c1))
  eqid(crn(cfv(cpmtr, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pmtridf1o(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 : c1 ↔ c1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ c0 = if(c3 = c4,(= |` c1),((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 }))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c3, c4, w0, (c0 : c1 ↔ c1))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ c3 = c4), (c0 : c1 ↔ c1), c0 =(= |` c1), ((= |` c1): c1 ↔ c1))
  syl5eq(c0, (= |` c1), if(c3 = c4,(= |` c1),((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 })), (w0 ∧ c3 = c4))
  adantl(w0, c3 = c4, if(c3 = c4,(= |` c1),((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 }))=(= |` c1))
  iftrue((= |` c1), ((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 }), c3 = c4)
  a1i((w0 ∧ c3 = c4), ((= |` c1): c1 ↔ c1))
  f1oi(c1)
  biimpar(c0 =(= |` c1), ((= |` c1): c1 ↔ c1), (c0 : c1 ↔ c1))
  f1oeq1(c0, (= |` c1), c1, c1)
  syl((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ c4), (c0 : c1 ↔ c1), c0 ∈ ran((pmTrsp ` c1)))
  eqeltrd(c0, ran((pmTrsp ` c1)), ((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 }), (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ c4))
  syl5eq(c0, ((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 }), if(c3 = c4,(= |` c1),((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 })), (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ c4))
  syl((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ c4), if(c3 = c4,(= |` c1),((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 }))=((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 }), ¬ c3 = c4)
  neneqd(c3, c4, (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ c4))
  iffalse((= |` c1), ((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 }), c3 = c4)
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ c4), ((pmTrsp ` c1)` { c3, c4 })∈ ran((pmTrsp ` c1)), c1 ∈ c2, { c3, c4 } ⊆ c1, { c3, c4 }[≅]2o)
  adantr(w0, c3 ≠ c4, c1 ∈ c2)
  prssd(c3, c4, c1, (w0 ∧ c3 ≠ c4))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ c3 ≠ c4), { c3, c4 }[≅]2o, c3 ∈ c1, c4 ∈ c1, c3 ≠ c4)
  adantr(w0, c3 ≠ c4, c3 ∈ c1)
  adantr(w0, c3 ≠ c4, c4 ∈ c1)
  simpr(w0, c3 ≠ c4)
  pr2nelem(c3, c1, c4, c1)
  pmtrrn(c1, c2, { c3, c4 }, (pmTrsp ` c1), ran((pmTrsp ` c1)))
  pmtrff1o(c0, ran((pmTrsp ` c1)), c1, (pmTrsp ` c1))
  eqid((pmTrsp ` c1))
  eqid(ran((pmTrsp ` c1)))
}

blocks.name: pmtridfv1
blocks.content: Value at X of the transposition of ` X ` and ` Y ` (understood to be the identity when X = Y ). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtridfv1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cif(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c1, c2, w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  3eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cres(cid, c3), c1), c1, wa(w0, wceq(c1, c2)))
  fveq1d(c0, c1, cres(cid, c3), wa(w0, wceq(c1, c2)))
  syl5eq(c0, cres(cid, c3), cif(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(w0, wceq(c1, c2)))
  iftrued(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), wa(w0, wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c3), c1), c1))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c3), c1), c1), wcel(c1, c3))
  fvresi(c1, c3)
  simpr(w0, wceq(c1, c2))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), c1), wa(w0, wne(c1, c2)))
  fveq1d(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), wa(w0, wne(c1, c2)))
  syl5eq(c0, cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), cif(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(w0, wne(c1, c2)))
  iffalsed(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), wa(w0, wne(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, c2))
  neneqd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wne(c1, c2)))
  syl13anc(wa(w0, wne(c1, c2)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c1, c2)), c1), c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c1, c2))
  adantr(w0, wne(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wne(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3))
  adantr(w0, wne(c1, c2), wcel(c2, c3))
  simpr(w0, wne(c1, c2))
  pmtrprfv(c3, c4, c1, c2, cfv(cpmtr, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cpmtr, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pmtridfv1(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c0 = if(c1 = c2,(= |` c3),((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 }))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c1, c2, w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2)
  3eqtrd((c0 ` c1), c2, ((= |` c3)` c1), c1, (w0 ∧ c1 = c2))
  fveq1d(c0, c1, (= |` c3), (w0 ∧ c1 = c2))
  syl5eq(c0, (= |` c3), if(c1 = c2,(= |` c3),((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 })), (w0 ∧ c1 = c2))
  iftrued((= |` c3), ((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 }), (w0 ∧ c1 = c2), c1 = c2)
  adantr(w0, c1 = c2, ((= |` c3)` c1)= c1)
  syl(w0, ((= |` c3)` c1)= c1, c1 ∈ c3)
  fvresi(c1, c3)
  simpr(w0, c1 = c2)
  eqtrd((c0 ` c1), c2, (((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 })` c1), (w0 ∧ c1 ≠ c2))
  fveq1d(c0, c1, ((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 }), (w0 ∧ c1 ≠ c2))
  syl5eq(c0, ((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 }), if(c1 = c2,(= |` c3),((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 })), (w0 ∧ c1 ≠ c2))
  iffalsed((= |` c3), ((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 }), (w0 ∧ c1 ≠ c2), c1 = c2)
  neneqd(c1, c2, (w0 ∧ c1 ≠ c2))
  syl13anc((w0 ∧ c1 ≠ c2), (((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c1, c2 })` c1)= c2, c3 ∈ c4, c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3, c1 ≠ c2)
  adantr(w0, c1 ≠ c2, c3 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c1 ≠ c2, c1 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, c1 ≠ c2, c2 ∈ c3)
  simpr(w0, c1 ≠ c2)
  pmtrprfv(c3, c4, c1, c2, (pmTrsp ` c3))
  eqid((pmTrsp ` c3))
}

blocks.name: pmtridfv2
blocks.content: Value at Y of the transposition of ` X ` and ` Y ` (understood to be the identity when X = Y ). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Jan-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm pmtridfv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wceq(c0, cif(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c1)))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c2, c1, w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), c2))
  3eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cres(cid, c3), c1), c1, wa(w0, wceq(c2, c1)))
  adantr(w0, wceq(c2, c1), wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c3), c1), c1))
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(cres(cid, c3), c1), c1), wcel(c1, c3))
  fvresi(c1, c3)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, cres(cid, c3), wa(w0, wceq(c2, c1)))
  syl5eq(c0, cres(cid, c3), cif(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c1)), wa(w0, wceq(c2, c1)))
  iftrued(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), wa(w0, wceq(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c1))
  simpr(w0, wceq(c2, c1))
  eqtrd(cfv(c0, c1), c2, cfv(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), c1), wa(w0, wne(c2, c1)))
  fveq1d(c0, c1, cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), wa(w0, wne(c2, c1)))
  syl5eq(c0, cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), cif(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c1)), wa(w0, wne(c2, c1)))
  iffalsed(cres(cid, c3), cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), wa(w0, wne(c2, c1)), wceq(c2, c1))
  neneqd(c2, c1, wa(w0, wne(c2, c1)))
  syl13anc(wa(w0, wne(c2, c1)), wceq(cfv(cfv(cfv(cpmtr, c3), cpr(c2, c1)), c1), c2), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, c3), wne(c2, c1))
  adantr(w0, wne(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c4))
  adantr(w0, wne(c2, c1), wcel(c2, c3))
  adantr(w0, wne(c2, c1), wcel(c1, c3))
  simpr(w0, wne(c2, c1))
  pmtrprfv2(c3, c4, c2, c1, cfv(cpmtr, c3))
  eqid(cfv(cpmtr, c3))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm pmtridfv2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)= c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ c0 = if(c2 = c1,(= |` c3),((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 }))
} = {
  pm2.61dane(c2, c1, w0, (c0 ` c1)= c2)
  3eqtr4d((c0 ` c1), c2, ((= |` c3)` c1), c1, (w0 ∧ c2 = c1))
  adantr(w0, c2 = c1, ((= |` c3)` c1)= c1)
  syl(w0, ((= |` c3)` c1)= c1, c1 ∈ c3)
  fvresi(c1, c3)
  fveq1d(c0, c1, (= |` c3), (w0 ∧ c2 = c1))
  syl5eq(c0, (= |` c3), if(c2 = c1,(= |` c3),((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 })), (w0 ∧ c2 = c1))
  iftrued((= |` c3), ((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 }), (w0 ∧ c2 = c1), c2 = c1)
  simpr(w0, c2 = c1)
  eqtrd((c0 ` c1), c2, (((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 })` c1), (w0 ∧ c2 ≠ c1))
  fveq1d(c0, c1, ((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 }), (w0 ∧ c2 ≠ c1))
  syl5eq(c0, ((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 }), if(c2 = c1,(= |` c3),((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 })), (w0 ∧ c2 ≠ c1))
  iffalsed((= |` c3), ((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 }), (w0 ∧ c2 ≠ c1), c2 = c1)
  neneqd(c2, c1, (w0 ∧ c2 ≠ c1))
  syl13anc((w0 ∧ c2 ≠ c1), (((pmTrsp ` c3)` { c2, c1 })` c1)= c2, c3 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ c3, c2 ≠ c1)
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c1, c3 ∈ c4)
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  adantr(w0, c2 ≠ c1, c1 ∈ c3)
  simpr(w0, c2 ≠ c1)
  pmtrprfv2(c3, c4, c2, c1, (pmTrsp ` c3))
  eqid((pmTrsp ` c3))
}
